generated.title: GeneratedMobility
generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'Mobility'

description*.en: "Mobility" characterizes how quickly a particle can move through a metal or semiconductor, when pulled by an electric field. The average drift speed imparted to a charged particle in a medium by an electric field, divided by the electric field strength.

title: Mobility
description: "Mobility" characterizes how quickly a particle can move through a metal or semiconductor, when pulled by an electric field. The average drift speed imparted to a charged particle in a medium by an electric field, divided by the electric field strength.
